verses.verse: בֶּן־ <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> [was] twenty וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> and five שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years מָלַ֣ךְ <WH4427> [when] he began to reign אֲמַצְיָ֔הוּ <WH558> Amaziah וְעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> twenty וָתֵ֙שַׁע֙ <WH8672> and nine שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> And his mother's יְהוֹעַדָּ֖ן <WH3086> [was] Jehoaddan מִירוּשָׁלָֽיִם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD רַ֕ק <WH7535> but לֹ֖א <WH3808> not בְּלֵבָ֥ב <WH3824> heart שָׁלֵֽם׃ <WH8003> but not with a perfect

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after חָזְקָ֥ה <WH2388> was established הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <WH4467> Now it came to pass when the kingdom עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וַֽיַּהֲרֹג֙ <WH2026> to him that he slew אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> his servants הַמַּכִּ֖ים <WH5221> that had killed אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> his father

וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> not their children לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor הֵמִ֑ית <WH4191> But he slew כִּ֣י <WH3588> for כַכָּת֣וּב <WH3789> but [did] as [it is] written בַּתּוֹרָ֡ה <WH8451> in the law בְּסֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> in the book מֹשֶׁה֩ <WH4872> of Moses אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which צִוָּ֨ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> where the LORD לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יָמ֨וּתוּ <WH4191> shall not die אָב֤וֹת <WH1> The fathers עַל־ <WH5921> for בָּנִים֙ <WH1121> for the children וּבָנִים֙ <WH1121> neither shall the children לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יָמ֣וּתוּ <WH4191> die עַל־ <WH5921> for אָב֔וֹת <WH1> for the fathers כִּ֛י <WH3588> but אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> but every man בְּחֶטְא֖וֹ <WH2399> for his own sin יָמֽוּתוּ׃ <WH4191> shall die פ

וַיִּקְבֹּ֤ץ <WH6908> together אֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH558> Moreover Amaziah אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah וַיַּֽעֲמִידֵ֣ם <WH5975> and made לְבֵית־ <WH1004> according to the houses אָב֗וֹת <WH1> of [their] fathers לְשָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> them captains הָאֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> over thousands וּלְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and captains הַמֵּא֔וֹת <WH3967> over hundreds לְכָל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> throughout all Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> and Benjamin וַֽיִּפְקְדֵ֗ם <WH6485> and he numbered לְמִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> them from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and above וַיִּמְצָאֵ֗ם <WH4672> and found שְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> them three מֵא֨וֹת <WH3967> hundred אֶ֤לֶף <WH505> thousand בָּחוּר֙ <WH970> choice יוֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> [men able] to go forth צָבָ֔א <WH6635> to war אֹחֵ֖ז <WH270> that could handle רֹ֥מַח <WH7420> spear וְצִנָּֽה׃ <WH6793> and shield

וַיִּשְׂכֹּ֣ר <WH7936> He hired מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> out of Israel מֵ֥אָה <WH3967> also an hundred אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> mighty חָ֖יִל <WH2428> men of valour בְּמֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> for an hundred כִכַּר־ <WH3603> talents כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> of silver

וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> a man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God בָּ֤א <WH935> But there came אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to him לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> to him saying הַמֶּ֕לֶךְ <WH4428> O king אַל־ <WH408> nay יָבֹ֥א <WH935> go עִמְּךָ֖ <WH5973> let צְבָ֣א <WH6635> let not the army יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֤ין <WH369> else יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God עִם־ <WH5973> with יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> [is] not with Israel כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> any בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> [to wit with] all the children אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> of Ephraim

כִּ֚י <WH3588> But אִם־ <WH518> if בֹּ֣א <WH935> But if thou wilt go אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> you עֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> do חֲזַ֣ק <WH2388> [it] be strong לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> for the battle יַכְשִֽׁילְךָ֤ <WH3782> shall make thee fall הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אוֹיֵ֔ב <WH341> the enemy כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> hath כֹּ֛חַ <WH3581> power בֵּאלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> for God לַעְז֥וֹר <WH5826> to help וּלְהַכְשִֽׁיל׃ <WH3782> and to cast down

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH558> And Amaziah לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> to the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וּמַֽה־ <WH4100> what לַּעֲשׂוֹת֙ <WH6213> But what shall we do לִמְאַ֣ת <WH3967> for the hundred הַכִּכָּ֔ר <WH3603> talents אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> which I have given לִגְד֣וּד <WH1416> to the army יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> answered אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> to the man הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God יֵ֚שׁ <WH3426> is לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD לָ֥תֶת <WH5414> able to give לְךָ֖ הַרְבֵּ֥ה <WH7235> thee much more מִזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיַּבְדִּילֵ֣ם <WH914> separated אֲמַצְיָ֗הוּ <WH558> Then Amaziah לְהַגְּדוּד֙ <WH1416> them [to wit] the army אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בָּ֤א <WH935> that was come אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to him מֵֽאֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> to him out of Ephraim לָלֶ֖כֶת <WH1980> to go לִמְקוֹמָ֑ם <WH4725> home וַיִּ֨חַר <WH2734> kindled אַפָּ֤ם <WH639> wherefore their anger מְאֹד֙ <WH3966> was greatly בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> against Judah וַיָּשׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> and they returned לִמְקוֹמָ֖ם <WH4725> home בָּחֳרִי־ <WH2750> in great אָֽף׃ <WH639> anger פ

וַאֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH558> And Amaziah הִתְחַזַּ֔ק <WH2388> strengthened וַיִּנְהַג֙ <WH5090> himself and led forth אֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> his people וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> along גֵּ֣יא <WH1516> to the valley הַמֶּ֑לַח <WH4417> of salt וַיַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH854> for בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children שֵׂעִ֖יר <WH8165> of Seir עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> ten אֲלָפִֽים׃ <WH505> thousand

וַעֲשֶׂ֨רֶת <WH6235> And [other] ten אֲלָפִ֜ים <WH505> thousand חַיִּ֗ים <WH2416> [left] alive שָׁבוּ֙ <WH7617> carry away captive בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> did the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיְבִיא֖וּם <WH935> and brought לְרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> them unto the top הַסָּ֑לַע <WH5553> of the rock וַיַּשְׁלִיכ֛וּם <WH7993> and cast them down מֵֽרֹאשׁ־ <WH7218> from the top הַסֶּ֖לַע <WH5553> of the rock וְכֻלָּ֥ם <WH3605> were all נִבְקָֽעוּ׃ <WH1234> that they all were broken in pieces ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> But the soldiers הַגְּד֗וּד <WH1416> of the army אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> sent הֵשִׁ֤יב <WH7725> sent back אֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH558> which Amaziah מִלֶּ֤כֶת <WH1980> along עִמּוֹ֙ <WH5973> with לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> with him to battle וַֽיִּפְשְׁטוּ֙ <WH6584> fell בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> upon the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah מִשֹּׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8111> from Samaria וְעַד־ <WH5704> against בֵּ֣ית חוֹר֑וֹן <WH1032> even unto Bethhoron וַיַּכּ֤וּ <WH5221> and smote מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> like שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> three אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> thousand וַיָּבֹ֖זּוּ <WH962> of them and took בִּזָּ֥ה <WH961> spoil רַבָּֽה׃ <WH7227> much ס

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵ֨י <WH310> Now it came to pass after ב֤וֹא <WH935> was come אֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH558> that Amaziah מֵֽהַכּ֣וֹת <WH5221> from the slaughter אֶת־ <WH853> אֲדוֹמִ֔ים <WH130> of the Edomites וַיָּבֵ֗א <WH935> that he brought אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> the gods בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children שֵׂעִ֔יר <WH8165> of Seir וַיַּֽעֲמִידֵ֥ם <WH5975> and set them up ל֖וֹ לֵאלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> [to be] his gods וְלִפְנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH6440> himself before יִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖ה <WH7812> and bowed down וְלָהֶ֥ם יְקַטֵּֽר׃ <WH6999> them and burned incense

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was kindled אַ֥ף <WH639> Wherefore the anger יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בַּאֲמַצְיָ֑הוּ <WH558> against Amaziah וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> and he sent אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about נָבִ֔יא <WH5030> unto him a prophet וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> which said ל֗וֹ לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why דָרַ֙שְׁתָּ֙ <WH1875> unto him Why hast thou sought אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> after the gods הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> have not הִצִּ֥ילוּ <WH5337> which could not deliver אֶת־ <WH853> עַמָּ֖ם <WH5971> their own people מִיָּדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> able

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become בְּדַבְּר֣וֹ <WH1696> And it came to pass as he talked אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> him וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> with him that [the king] said לוֹ֙ הַלְיוֹעֵ֤ץ <WH3289> counsel לַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> of the king's נְתַנּ֔וּךָ <WH5414> unto him Art thou made חֲדַל־ <WH2308> ? forbear לְךָ֖ לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Why יַכּ֑וּךָ <WH5221> why shouldest thou be smitten וַיֶּחְדַּ֣ל <WH2308> forbare הַנָּבִ֗יא <WH5030> ? Then the prophet וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said יָדַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> I know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because יָעַ֤ץ <WH3289> hath determined אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> that God לְהַשְׁחִיתֶ֔ךָ <WH7843> to destroy כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because עָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> thee because thou hast done זֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not שָׁמַ֖עְתָּ <WH8085> this and hast not hearkened לַעֲצָתִֽי׃ <WH6098> unto my counsel פ

וַיִּוָּעַ֗ץ <WH3289> took advice אֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH558> Then Amaziah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <WH7971> and sent אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹאָ֨שׁ <WH3101> to Joash בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹאָחָ֧ז <WH3059> of Jehoahaz בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֵה֛וּא <WH3058> of Jehu מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying [לְךָ כ] (לְכָ֖ה ק) נִתְרָאֶ֥ה <WH7200> let us see one another פָנִֽים׃ <WH6440> in the face

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <WH7971> sent יוֹאָ֣שׁ <WH3101> And Joash מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲמַצְיָ֣הוּ <WH558> to Amaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָה֮ <WH3063> of Judah לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying הַח֜וֹחַ <WH2336> The thistle אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּלְּבָנ֗וֹן <WH3844> that [was] in Lebanon שָׁ֠לַח <WH7971> sent אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאֶ֜רֶז <WH730> to the cedar אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which בַּלְּבָנוֹן֙ <WH3844> that [was] in Lebanon לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying תְּנָֽה־ <WH5414> Give אֶת־ <WH853> בִּתְּךָ֥ <WH1323> thy daughter לִבְנִ֖י <WH1121> to my son לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> to wife וַֽתַּעֲבֹ֞ר <WH5674> and there passed by חַיַּ֤ת <WH2416> beast הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> a wild אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּלְּבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> that [was] in Lebanon וַתִּרְמֹ֖ס <WH7429> and trode down אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֽוֹחַ׃ <WH2336> the thistle

אָמַ֗רְתָּ <WH559> Thou sayest הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold הִכִּ֙יתָ֙ <WH5221> Lo thou hast smitten אֶת־ <WH853> אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> the Edomites וּנְשָׂאֲךָ֥ <WH5375> lifteth thee up לִבְּךָ֖ <WH3820> and thine heart לְהַכְבִּ֑יד <WH3513> to boast עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now שְׁבָ֣ה <WH3427> abide בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> now at home לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> why תִתְגָּרֶה֙ <WH1624> why shouldest thou meddle בְּרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> to [thine] hurt וְנָ֣פַלְתָּ֔ <WH5307> that thou shouldest fall אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you וִיהוּדָ֥ה <WH3063> [even] thou and Judah עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> would not hear אֲמַצְיָ֔הוּ <WH558> But Amaziah כִּ֤י <WH3588> because מֵהָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> for it [came] of God הִ֔יא <WH1931> he לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> might תִּתָּ֣ם <WH5414> that he might deliver בְּיָ֑ד <WH3027> them into the hand כִּ֣י <WH3588> because דָֽרְשׁ֔וּ <WH1875> [of their enemies] because they sought אֵ֖ת <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> after the gods אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> of Edom
